
data inspection
```{r}

```

```{r}

```

```{r}
av_cat <- cut(average_rating,breaks = c(0,2.7,4.5,5),include.lowest = T,
               right = T)
plot(av_cat)
```

```{r}
summary(av_cat)
```
discretising average  rating turn it heavily unbalanced. 

```{r}
prop.table(table(av_cat))
```

Above 97% of average rating are between 2.7 and 4.5.
